mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARTITEM (CARTITEMID, CARTMEMBERID, QUANTITY) VALUES (#{cartItemId}, #{cartMemberId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CARTITEMID FROM CARTITEM WHERE CARTMEMBERID = #{memberId}
SELECT B.*, A.QUANTITY FROM (SELECT CARTITEMID, SUM(QUANTITY) AS QUANTITY FROM CARTITEM WHERE CARTITEMID = #{itemId} GROUP BY CARTITEMID) AS A LEFT JOIN ITEM AS B ON B.ITEMID = A.CARTITEMID
SELECT SUM(ITEM.PRICE * CARTITEM.QUANTITY) FROM CARTITEM LEFT JOIN ITEM ON CARTMEMBERID = 'pl1633@naver.com'
